messages.subject: Hi everybody
messages.msgSnippet: What a wonderful bunch this is. I ve so enjoyed it already.....this group just has a good feeling to it. We are the Yates Family.  we live on a farm in NC. We
messages.messageBody:
What a wonderful bunch this is.
I've so enjoyed it already.....this group just has a good feeling to it.

We are the Yates Family. we live on a farm in NC.
We have horses, goats, chickens, ducks, dogs, cats and a partridge in a
pear tree! :) (Just kidding)
The kids are Keller, age 6, Aaron age 4, and Mattingly age 3. We have
spent the last six months putting an addition on our home, and boy have
there been ample opportunities for unschoolng!!! Now we are
landscaping, and then we move on to remodeling the kitchen.
We really enjoy our animals, and mostly spend alot of time playing and
reading.
I struggle with "not doing anything", when I am around others, and do
that awful thing called "comparing my kids to others", but I really
truly feel like unschooling is real life.
I'm really happy to have found this group of diverse people to share
with....
Ann
